name: Beeb-Darts
overview: Beeb-Darts (also known as Flights of Fancy) is a 1-2 player darts game for the BBC Micro. It was developed by M.J. Parrot and published as a type-in game in the following: - Your Computer magazine, volume 3, issue 5, in May 1983. - Your Computer magazine, volume 6, issue 5, in May 1986.
